content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-21, -73)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -21.0, -73.0) mining copper ore
- Iron chest (position -21.5, -74.5) storing copper ore
- Burner inserter (position -20.5, -74.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (position -19.0, -74.0) smelting copper plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (-2, -76)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -2.0, -76.0) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace (position -1.0, -74.0) smelting iron plates
- Burner inserter (position 0.5, -74.5) moving plates
- Iron chest (position 1.5, -74.5) storing iron plates

### Iron Plate Processing Line
Consists of:
- Iron chest (position 3.5, -75.5) storing iron plates
- Multiple burner inserters at positions:
  - (3.5, -74.5)
  - (5.5, -74.5)
  - (1.5, -72.5)
  - (6.5, -72.5)
- Stone furnaces at positions:
  - (3.0, -73.0)
  - (5.0, -73.0)
- Transport belt system connecting various components:
  - Belt group from (1.5, -74.5) to (1.5, -72.5)
  - Belt group from (0.5, -70.5) to (7.5, -69.5)
  - Belt group connecting (-0.5, -71.5) area
  - Belt group from (0.5, -71.5) to (8.5, -74.5)
- Additional storage chests:
  - Iron chest (position 7.5, -72.5)
  - Iron chest (position 3.5, -71.5)
  - Iron chest (position 0.5, -72.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Position Object Usage Errors
- When inspecting inventories, use the correct method for the entity type instead of trying to access position attributes directly

### Resource Collection Errors
- Verify the presence of resources at a position before attempting to pick them up
- Double-check coordinates when attempting to collect resources
- Ensure you are at the correct position before attempting resource collection

### Entity Placement Issues
- Several furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warnings - ensure proper input feed
- Some inserters are waiting for source items - verify the logistics chain is properly connected
- Mining drill shows "output blocked" warning - ensure proper output collection setup
